column3: {([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`12>>* I'm so nervous. I'm not sure if this is sweat or if I unlocked some powerful water spell. . . ])}
{([ The headmaster gave me the pep talk of a lifetime. Today I'm just gonna focus on doing better than yesterday. ])}
{([ Apparently you and I are facing each other today! I can't wait to see what you throw at me! ])}
{([ I'm feeling so fired up after our match yesterday! This wasn't so bad after all. ])}
{([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`4>>* I barely lasted 5 minutes out there. . . I knew I'd choke if there were people here. Even Mr Domino came. God I'm so embarrassed. . . ])}
{([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`0>>* Well, I still lost, but I had a lot of fun. I feel like I'm starting to get how swapping works. ])}
{([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`0>>* I had a great time sparring with you. I learn so much from you guys. It's crazy how clearly I can see your thoughts when we're sparring. ])}
{([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`0>>* I wish you could've seen my spar against Marco! I almost had him. He even admitted he was nervous the whole second half of our match! ])}
{([Alright *<`INSERT PLAYER NAME>*, it's finally our turn. Don't go easy on me! ])}
{([I can't believe it! You'd better not have been going easy on me! ])}
{([Ahhhh man! I thought I had you! ])}
{([Wait--w-why would we do that? I don't want random people from the island to come watch me spar. ])}
{([I wonder if we'll have some time to practice after the festival. I want to use the training fields to work on my spellcasting. ])}
{([I admit, today ended up being a lot of fun. I get so nervous before sparring, but once I get in the groove it feels great! Especially when I'm with my friends. ])}
{([I'm sorta sad this is all over. It's been a while since anyone has come to visit Miriabram. This really made me feel more connected to the rest of the island. ])}
{([TODO])}
{([TODO])}
{([ Haha, to think that earlier I was trying to get the Headmaster to cancel the festival. Now I'm mad that I don't have another match till tomorrow! ])}
{([TODO])}
{([ Gosh I'm so nervous. I tried convincing the Headmaster to cancel this thing. . . or at least push it back to tomorrow. . . I just know I'm gonna do terribly. . . ])}
{([TODO])}
{([TODO])}
{([TODO])}
{([TODO])}

{([I can't sleep quite yet. I keep thinking of my match earlier and I feel like my mind is on fire with new ideas. So what do you say? Wanna have a spar with me and help me prepare for tomorrow? ])([*<`DISPLAY EMOJIS`<`0>`<`4>>*That's okay. . . I get it. . . ][*<`BEGIN SPAR>* Alright! Don't underestimate me just because I'm new to this! ])}

{([ I'm so excited that we're going to get the opportunity to spar with real monks who already graduated and got their beginner's licenses! . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Okay I'm also REALLY nervous, but I know that even if I lose, I'm going to learn so much from these matches! ])}

{([Oh boy, my blood is really pumping! Who do you think you'll spar against first? ])([That's what I figured! You both have a fiery energy, it should be an awesome match! ][Hmm, I wonder what the outcome of that match will be. . . ][That's no surprise! She's got a fierce vibe! ][Eughh. . . something about them gives me the creeps! ])}

{([It's hard to decide who to spar with next! I never realized how much fun this could be! ])}
